products.title: Rimini, Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Rimini, Turquoise - Roller Blind
products.description: The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

products.title: Rimini, Powder Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

products.title: Stockholm Sapphire Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm sapphire blue is a beautiful colour, and works erfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm sapphire blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Stockholm Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm dark teal blue is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash dark teal blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Stockholm Midnight Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This rich midnight blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room.

products.title: Stockholm Brittany Blue Roller Blind
products.description: This light brittany blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This light blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Brittany Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This cool-toned brittany blue blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Dark Teal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dramatic dark teal blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Stirlo Royal Blue
products.description: Stirloroyalblue plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Stirlo Duck Egg Blue
products.description: Stirloduck egg blue plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Stirlo Ink Blue
products.description: Stirloink blue plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout)'s blue combines their ever popular blackout fabric, with its unique, fine texturing, with a timeless blue that is sure to add a simple splash of colour and a touch of fresh, contemporary style to any room. Use the rimini blue to match pretty florals in the bedroom for a fresh, country look, or stark whites in the kitchen for a contemporary style. It's also the perfect shade for a sea-themed bathroom or a fun, colourful playroom for the kids.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in bluebell is a classic light blue that is sure to add a touch of elegance to any home. But it's certainly not style over substance, with the rimini fabric being a top quality blackout material that provides all you need when it comes to keeping out the glare of the sun. Combine the pretty bluebell colour with soft yellows and rich creams to create a vibrant yet not overpowering colour scheme.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Cobalt - Roller Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality with modern style, the rimini (blackout) in cobalt is a high quality blackout blind with an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Featuring a striking blue tone as a bold and vibrant feature, it is sure to add a burst of alluring colour and personality wherever it goes. Display the cobalt against a contrasting white and dove grey background for a contemporary palette in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in navy is a traditional navy blue that will never go out of style. Made from the latest blackout fabric, this blind is best way control unwanted light from the outside changing the mood of your room or affecting your night's sleep. Offset the navy against a bright reds and ice whites for a fun, naval theme in a living room or bedroom. Or consider combining it with a lighter blues and purples for a beautifully stepped colour theme in a dining room or home office.

products.title: Burst Royal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Just like a nice business suit, this blind loves to work hard and party harder. Moderate and refined, the deep royal blue is a statement of professionalism and style that works perfectly in a range of colour schemes, from neutral tones like beiges and browns, to a more blue oriented palette in which this blind will act as the foil. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Burst Baby Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Enjoy the soft baby blue colour in your home with the burst baby blue roller blind, perfect for gently filtering the light coming through your window and illuminating your room in a gentle blue hue. Use these blinds in your kitchen or bathroom to add a stylish edge to your decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: Voile fr cobalt blue is a semi-translucent stylish, dark blue roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in blue that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.
